casebody.data:
CASE ANNOUNCEMENTS

May 4, 2011

[Cite as 05/04/2011 Case Announcements #2, 2011-Ohio-2138.]

MOTION AND PROCEDURAL RULINGS

2011-0741. State v. Bedford.

Hamilton App. No. C-100735, 2011-Ohio-2054. This cause is pending before the court as a discretionary appeal and claimed appeal of right and is related to an execution scheduled for May 17, 2011. Therefore, in order to expedite this court’s consideration of the appeal, it is ordered by the court, sua sponte, that the appellee shall file a memorandum in response no later than 10 a.m. on Monday, May 9, 2011.
